description: Students study topics related to the environment. Topics vary from year to year at the discretion of the instructor. Topic may include Literature of the Poles, Environment and Theology, Environmental Justice, and Ecotourism. Class is largely discussion-based but may include a lab/field work component depending on the topic. May be repeated if topics are different.
name: Top: Lit of the Poles
notes: Open to first-year students by permission only.
title: Topics in Environmental Studies
